verses.verse: אָ֭הַבְתִּי <WH157> 'A-hav-ti I love כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- because יִשְׁמַ֥ע׀ <WH8085> yish-Ma' because he hath heard יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- ק֝וֹלִ֗י <WH6963> ko-Li, my voice תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃ <WH8469> ta-cha-nu-Nai. [and] my supplications

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- Because הִטָּ֣ה <WH5186> hit-Tah Because he hath inclined אָזְנ֣וֹ <WH241> a-ze-No his ear לִ֑י Li; וּבְיָמַ֥י <WH3117> u-ve-ya-Mai upon [him] as long as I live אֶקְרָֽא׃ <WH7121> 'ek-Ra. unto me therefore will I call

אֲפָפ֤וּנִי׀ <WH661> 'a-fa-Fu-ni compassed חֶבְלֵי־ <WH2256> chev-lei- The sorrows מָ֗וֶת <WH4194> Ma-vet, of death וּמְצָרֵ֣י <WH4712> u-me-tza-Rei me and the pains שְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> she-'ol of hell מְצָא֑וּנִי <WH4672> me-tza-'U-ni; gat hold צָרָ֖ה <WH6869> tza-Rah trouble וְיָג֣וֹן <WH3015> ve-ya-Gon and sorrow אֶמְצָֽא׃ <WH4672> 'em-Tza. upon me I found

וּבְשֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> u-ve-shem- I upon the name יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶקְרָ֑א <WH7121> 'ek-Ra; Then called אָנָּ֥ה <WH577> 'an-Nah I beseech יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD מַלְּטָ֥ה <WH4422> mal-le-Tah thee deliver נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> naf-Shi. my soul

חַנּ֣וּן <WH2587> chan-Nun Gracious יְהֹוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [is] the LORD וְצַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> ve-tzad-Dik; and righteous וֵ֖אלֹהֵ֣ינוּ <WH430> ve-lo-Hei-nu yea our God מְרַחֵֽם׃ <WH7355> me-ra-Chem. [is] merciful

שֹׁמֵ֣ר <WH8104> sho-Mer preserveth פְּתָאיִ֣ם <WH6612> pe-ta-Yim the simple יְהֹוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; The LORD דַּ֝לּוֹתִ֗י <WH1809> dal-lo-Ti, I was brought low וְלִ֣י ve-Li יְהוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <WH3467> ye-ho-Shi-a'. and he helped

שׁוּבִ֣י <WH7725> shu-Vi Return נַ֭פְשִׁי <WH5315> Naf-shi O my soul לִמְנוּחָ֑יְכִי <WH4496> lim-nu-Cha-ye-chi; comfortable כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- For יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh for the LORD גָּמַ֥ל <WH1580> ga-Mal hath dealt bountifully עָלָֽיְכִי׃ <WH5921> 'a-La-ye-chi. and

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for חִלַּ֥צְתָּ <WH2502> chil-Latz-ta For thou hast delivered נַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> naf-Shi, my soul מִ֫מָּ֥וֶת <WH4194> mi-Ma-vet from death אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֵינִ֥י <WH5869> 'ei-Ni mine eyes מִן־ <WH4480> min- from דִּמְעָ֑ה <WH1832> dim-'Ah; from tears אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- רַגְלִ֥י <WH7272> rag-Li [and] my feet מִדֶּֽחִי׃ <WH1762> mid-De-chi. from falling

אֶ֭תְהַלֵּךְ <WH1980> 'Et-hal-lech I will walk לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD בְּ֝אַרְצ֗וֹת <WH776> be-'ar-Tzot, in the land הַֽחַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> Ha-chai-Yim. of the living

הֶ֭אֱמַנְתִּי <WH539> He-'e-man-ti I believed כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki when אֲדַבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> 'a-dab-Ber; therefore have I spoken אֲ֝נִ֗י <WH589> 'a-Ni, I עָנִ֥יתִי <WH6031> 'a-Ni-ti afflicted מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> me-'Od. I was greatly

אֲ֭נִי <WH589> 'A-ni I אָמַ֣רְתִּי <WH559> 'a-Mar-ti I said בְחָפְזִ֑י <WH2648> ve-cha-fe-Zi; in my haste כָּֽל־ <WH3605> kal- All הָאָדָ֥ם <WH120> ha-'a-Dam All men כֹּזֵֽב׃ <WH3576> ko-Zev. [are] liars

מָֽה־ <WH4100> mah- What אָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> 'a-Shiv What shall I render לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; unto the LORD כָּֽל־ <WH3605> kal- for all תַּגְמוּל֥וֹהִי <WH8408> tag-mu-Lo-hi [for] all his benefits עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lai. toward

כּוֹס־ <WH3563> kos- the cup יְשׁוּע֥וֹת <WH3444> ye-shu-'ot of salvation אֶשָּׂ֑א <WH5375> 'es-Sa; I will take וּבְשֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> u-ve-Shem upon the name יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶקְרָֽא׃ <WH7121> 'ek-Ra. and call

נְ֭דָרַי <WH5088> Ne-da-rai my vows לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֲשַׁלֵּ֑ם <WH7999> 'a-shal-Lem; I will pay נֶגְדָה־ <WH5048> neg-dah- the presence נָּ֝֗א <WH4994> Na, Oh לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol of all עַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> am-Mo. now in the presence of all his people

יָ֭קָר <WH3368> Ya-kor Precious בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD הַ֝מָּ֗וְתָה <WH4194> ham-Ma-ve-tah, [is] the death לַחֲסִידָֽיו׃ <WH2623> la-cha-si-Dav. of his saints

אָֽנָּ֣ה <WH577> 'an-Nah truly יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- surely אֲנִ֪י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am עַ֫בְדֶּ֥ךָ <WH5650> 'av-De-cha I [am] thy servant אֲ‍ ֽנִי־ <WH589> 'ani- I am עַ֭בְדְּךָ <WH5650> 'Av-de-cha I [am] thy servant בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- [and] the son אֲמָתֶ֑ךָ <WH519> 'a-ma-Te-cha; of thine handmaid פִּ֝תַּ֗חְתָּ <WH6605> pit-Tach-ta, thou hast loosed לְמוֹסֵרָֽי׃ <WH4147> le-mo-se-Rai. my bonds

לְֽךָ־ le-cha- אֶ֭זְבַּח <WH2076> 'Ez-bach I will offer זֶ֣בַח <WH2077> Ze-vach to thee the sacrifice תּוֹדָ֑ה <WH8426> to-Dah; of thanksgiving וּבְשֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> u-ve-Shem upon the name יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶקְרָֽא׃ <WH7121> 'ek-Ra. and will call

בְּחַצְר֤וֹת׀ <WH2691> be-chatz-Rot In the courts בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> beit house יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD'S בְּֽת֘וֹכֵ֤כִי <WH8432> be-To-Che-chi in the midst יְֽרוּשָׁלִָ֗ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of thee O Jerusalem הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> hal-lu- Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> Yah. ye the LORD
